definitions.definition: Any person with a disability or illness .
A person who is confined to home or bed because of illness , disability or injury ; one who is too sick or weak to care for themselves.
A disabled member of the armed forces ; one unfit for active duty due to injury .

main_definition: ( dated , sometimes offensive ) Any person with a disability or illness .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , sometimes offensive ) A person who is confined to home or bed because of illness , disability or injury ; one who is too sick or weak to care for themselves.
( archaic ) A disabled member of the armed forces ; one unfit for active duty due to injury .
